constraints.name: sum_constraint
constraints.description: 区间内元素和必须大于等于给定值
constraints.formal: sum(A[A_i:B_i]) >= C_i for all 1 <= i <= K

constraints.name: existence_requirement
constraints.description: 序列中某些位置的元素是固定的，不能改变
constraints.formal: P_i = -1 or P_i = 1 implies A[i] = P_i

constraints.name: ordering
constraints.description: 在满足所有约束条件下，序列应为字典序最小的序列
constraints.formal: Find the lexicographically smallest sequence that satisfies all constraints

result.description: 在满足一系列区间和约束条件下，构造字典序最小的序列

invariants.name: optimal_substructure
invariants.description: 最优子结构：问题的最优解可以通过子问题的最优解组合得到，满足动态规划的基本性质

invariants.name: interval_additivity
invariants.description: 区间可加性：区间和可以通过端点差值计算，适用于前缀和等技术

invariants.name: greedy_choice
invariants.description: 贪心选择性质：局部最优选择导致全局最优，通过每次选择最小值来构建字典序最小的序列
